<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofpr

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.78

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Tests whether any user dialog is open.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[Boolean]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> [[dialog]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] -  
true if a dialog is open, false if not
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] (![[dialog]]) [[then]] {[[createDialog]] "Dialog1";};</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[displayCtrl]], [[createDisplay]], [[createDialog]], [[closeDialog]], [[displayNull]], [[controlNull]], [[createDisplay]], [[ctrlCreate]], [[displayParent]], [[Arma: GUI Configuration]]
</value></part></template>
